guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.title: GUI Compass Config
guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_guiCom: What of the GUI compass should be displayed. Default: [FXYZ]. F: facing (direction), X: x coord, Y: y coord (depth), Z: z coord.
guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_mustHa: When enabled, will only show the GUI compass when a compass is present in the inventory.
guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_compas: Places the GUI compass on the left.
Places the GUI compass in the middle.
Places the GUI compass on the right.
The vertical offset (y coord) for the Compass. This determines how far down the time should be on the screen. Can be changed to prevent GUIs from overlapping.
guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_R: The red RGB value for the compass text.
guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_G: The green RGB value for the compass text.
guicompass-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_RGB_B: The blue RGB value for the compass text.
